Package io.nem.symbol.sdk.model.transaction

Class MosaicDefinitionTransaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.nem.symbol.sdk.model.transaction.Transaction
      • io.nem.symbol.sdk.model.transaction.MosaicDefinitionTransaction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Stored
    public class MosaicDefinitionTransaction
extends Transaction
    Mosaic definition transaction.

    Before a mosaic can be created or transferred, a corresponding definition of the mosaic has to be created and published to the network. This is done via a mosaic definition transaction.

    Since:
    1.0
